page.title: 04A Child's Day.
page.content: My name is{Adrian.}I am{7 years old.}I woke at 7 o'clock, got dressed,watched Popeye. For breakfast I had cornflakes then toast with strawberry jam.I played, before going to school in mummy's car. I changed my library book. It was the day for{Maypole dancing. We did{Spiders Web}and{Double {Plaiting.}Then I sat on the bottom of the pole while others danced the{ {Barbers Pole.}We sang to our visitors. After play we watched Seeing and Doing. We wrote about it. Then it was lunch time. Afterwards we could play outside. In the afternoon I finished my work. I played with lego. At home time I walked with a lady to her house. Mummy came there for me.At home I rode my B.M.X.bike. I had fish and chips for dinner and went to bed at 7pm.I read my book till 9pm.
